title.value: Конверсия энергии рационов в продукцию при использовании экструдированного обогатителя в составе комбикорма КР-1 для телят
Conversion of energy in diets into produce using extruded feed enricher in the KR-1 compound feed for calves
Conversion of energy in diets into produce using extruded feed enricher in the KR-1 compound feed for calves

journal.title: Zootechnical Science of Belarus: collection of scientific papers

person.name: Shinkareva, S.L., National Academy of Sciences. Scientific and Practical Center of Animal Breeding (Belarus)

abstract.value: With the purpose of definition of compound fodders with different norms of input EPC influence on parameters of rumen digestion, nutrients digestibility, the balance of nitrogen and mineral elements, and blood biochemical structure is lead physiological experience in agricultural farm Nadezhdino in Tolochinskij district of Vitebsk area. Skilled compound fodders KR-1 are prepared in OS Orshanskij bakeries combine. Experimental groups are completed by bulls of average alive weight 50-52 kg. Duration of experience has made 45 days. The use of extruded enricher in diets for calves in compound feed KR-1 in the amount of 15% increases conversion of feed energy by 27.7%, which allows to increase the average daily weight gain by 8%, reduce feed costs by 10%, the prime cost of produce – by 11%
